text:
You continue to abuse our children daily. But this is a big one I will make damn sure I emphasize in any forum that examines if you are making
positive child focused  decisions in their best interests vs. personal retribution at the expense of their mental health.
This one’s a Slam dunk. Get it?
Message 2205 of 4024
Your assertions below are incorrect.
I agree we will have a forum that examines what is in best interest of children.
You and I are so far apart on our views.
Sent:03/17/2024 at 10:50 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 03/17/2024 at 10:51 PM)
Subject:Re: Thank You
Message 2206 of 4024
Which part is incorrect below?
You did answer my urgent call?
It had not worked yesterday?
It’s not important to Adrian?
Sent:03/17/2024 at 10:52 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/18/2024 at 12:40 PM)
Subject:Re: Thank You
Message 2207 of 4024
How should I expect to co-parent with you in the best interests of Max and Adrian now that you don’t communicate? You don’t reply here till it’s
well past time to understand the unilateral decisions you have made. You carry on communications with 3rd parties involving our children in email
where you have banned me from participating. And refuse to take urgent or emergency calls?
You have essentially made it impossible to co-parent between us and others or discuss ongoing community property issues. Please let me know
without another excuse that you will tell me someday. Because I am already doing as you asked, but you are not even adhering to your own guidelines.
Yes- this is for better and more healthy co-parenting and property discussions as well as documentation that you refuse to do both. I’m
Sent:03/18/2024 at 11:22 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 03/18/2024 at 12:40 PM)
Subject:Communication as Healthy Coparents
